analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x3db0f5f5a41e220727e59f4e19e93f8916d87c3c.sol:
	Contract Tipcoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x3db0f5f5a41e220727e59f4e19e93f8916d87c3c.sol#92)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/46/0x3db0f5f5a41e220727e59f4e19e93f8916d87c3c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.17 (/unique_chucks/46/0x3db0f5f5a41e220727e59f4e19e93f8916d87c3c.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_spender' of Tipcoin.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/46/0x3db0f5f5a41e220727e59f4e19e93f8916d87c3c.sol#181) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addedValue' of Tipcoin.increaseApproval (/unique_chucks/46/0x3db0f5f5a41e220727e59f4e19e93f8916d87c3c.sol#181) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of Tipcoin.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/46/0x3db0f5f5a41e220727e59f4e19e93f8916d87c3c.sol#199-200) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_subtractedValue' of Tipcoin.decreaseApproval (/unique_chucks/46/0x3db0f5f5a41e220727e59f4e19e93f8916d87c3c.sol#200-201) is not in mixedCase
